findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop sales for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%).

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: MTS - Manipulate Total Supply
findings.description: Owner is able to manipulate total supply, directly impacting token price and Market Cap.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, making the code's size bigger.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: Owner manipulation of fees
findings.description: The owner can abuse admin functions to manipulate fees.

findings.title: Stopping transactions by owner
findings.description: The owner can abuse admin functions to stop transactions.
findings.location: TokenReward contract, manualrebase and withdrawAllToOwner functions

findings.title: Blacklisting contracts by owner
findings.description: The owner can abuse admin functions to blacklist contracts.

findings.title: Potential honeypot creation
findings.description: The contract can be converted into a honeypot and prevent users from selling if the owner abuses admin functions.
